properties.label: Process Order
properties.name: process_order
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

input.sql:
SELECT
        EKKN.AUFNR AS [Process Order #], 
        EKKN.EBELN AS [Purchase Order], 
        EKKN.EBELP AS [Purchase Order Item #], 
        AFPO.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],
        AFPO.PWERK AS [Plant],
        MAKT.MAKTX AS [Description], 
        MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
        EKPO.WEBRE AS [BOL# Required],
        EKPO.LOEKZ AS [Deletion Indicator],
        EKPO.UEBTK AS [PO Unlimited Overdelivery Allowed],
        EKPO.BSTAE AS [PO Confirmation Control Key],
        EKPO.EREKZ AS [PO Final Invoice],
        EKPO.ELIKZ AS [PO Delivery Completed],
        AFPO.LGORT AS [Storage Location],
        AFPO.UEBTK AS [ProcOrd Unlimited Overdelivery Allowed],
        AFPO.ELIKZ AS [ProcOrd Delivery Completed],
        AFPO.XLOEK AS [ProcOrd Deletion Flag]
FROM 
sap.ekkn AS EKKN
INNER JOIN sap.afpo AS AFPO
ON EKKN.AUFNR = AFPO.AUFNR
INNER JOIN sap.ekpo AS EKPO
ON EKKN.ebeln = EKPO.ebeln
AND EKKN.ebelp = EKPO.ebelp
LEFT JOIN sap.makt AS MAKT
ON AFPO.MATNR = MAKT.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.mara AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
WHERE EKKN.AUFNR IN ('000#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"4dfae70b","path":["process_order"]}')}') 
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'                                             
AND AFPO.PWERK = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"b29f623f","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'   
AND (MAKT.MATNR <> '' OR MAKT.MATNR IS NOT NULL);
input.output_schema: [{"control_type":"text","label":"Process  order #","type":"string","name":"Process Order #"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Purchase  order","type":"string","name":"Purchase Order"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Purchase  order  item #","type":"string","name":"Purchase Order Item #"},{"control_type":"text","label":"P& g  GCA s #","type":"string","name":"P&G GCAS #"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Plant","type":"string","name":"Plant"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Description","type":"string","name":"Description"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Uo M","type":"string","name":"UoM"},{"control_type":"text","label":"BO l#  required","type":"string","name":"BOL# Required"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Deletion  indicator","type":"string","name":"Deletion Indicator"},{"control_type":"text","label":"P o  unlimited  overdelivery  allowed","type":"string","name":"PO Unlimited Overdelivery Allowed"},{"control_type":"text","label":"P o  confirmation  control  key","type":"string","name":"PO Confirmation Control Key"},{"control_type":"text","label":"P o  final  invoice","type":"string","name":"PO Final Invoice"},{"control_type":"text","label":"P o  delivery  completed","type":"string","name":"PO Delivery Completed"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Storage  location","type":"string","name":"Storage Location"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Proc ord  unlimited  overdelivery  allowed","type":"string","name":"ProcOrd Unlimited Overdelivery Allowed"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Proc ord  delivery  completed","type":"string","name":"ProcOrd Delivery Completed"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Proc ord  deletion  flag","type":"string","name":"ProcOrd Deletion Flag"}]

input.sql:
SELECT 
	MSEG.MBLNR AS [SAP Document #], 
	MSEG.AUFNR AS [Process Order #], 
	MSEG.EBELN AS [Purchase Order], 
	MSEG.EBELP AS [Purchase Order Item #], 
	AFPO.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],	
	MSEG.WERKS AS [Plant],
	MAKT.MAKTX AS [Description], 
	MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
	EKPO.WEBRE AS [BOL# Required],
	EKPO.LOEKZ AS [Deletion Indicator],
	EKPO.UEBTK AS [PO Unlimited Overdelivery Allowed],
	EKPO.BSTAE AS [PO Confirmation Control Key],
	EKPO.EREKZ AS [PO Final Invoice],
	EKPO.ELIKZ AS [PO Delivery Completed],
	AFPO.LGORT AS [Storage Location],
	AFPO.UEBTK AS [ProcOrd Unlimited Overdelivery Allowed],
	AFPO.ELIKZ AS [ProcOrd Delivery Completed],
	AFPO.XLOEK AS [ProcOrd Deletion Flag]
FROM 
sap.MSEG AS MSEG
INNER JOIN sap.afpo AS AFPO
ON MSEG.AUFNR = AFPO.AUFNR
INNER JOIN sap.ekpo AS EKPO
ON MSEG.ebeln = EKPO.ebeln
AND MSEG.ebelp = EKPO.ebelp
LEFT JOIN sap.makt AS MAKT
ON AFPO.MATNR = MAKT.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.mara AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
WHERE MSEG.MBLNR IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"3ebed589","path":["5b0f1998_3464_4256_8a19_9cdca3f90211"]}')}')		--[Replace with List of SAP Document #]
AND RIGHT(AFPO.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"3ebed589","path":["6f8e896a_26e1_48d4_b746_85eba6a5e20b"]}')}')	--[Replace with List of P&G GCAS #]
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'						--CONSTANT FOR ENGLISH
AND MSEG.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0b08f5e1","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'						--[Replace with Plant#]
AND AFPO.LGORT = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"0b08f5e1","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"6aced24e_c3d9_448f_9f03_06eb2e3db69c"]}')}'					--[Replace with Storage Location]
AND (MAKT.MATNR <> '' OR MAKT.MATNR IS NOT NULL);

properties.label: GCAS
properties.name: GCARS
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],        
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
MARD.LABST AS [SAP Inventory],
MBEW.STPRS AS [Standard price]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MBEW
ON MBEW.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
AND MBEW.BWKEY = MARD.WERKS
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"09d3e404","path":["GCARS"]}')}')      
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'                          
AND MARD.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"a98a2df8","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'                                       
AND MARD.LGORT = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"a98a2df8","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"6aced24e_c3d9_448f_9f03_06eb2e3db69c"]}')}'

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],        
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN (#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"2b1a002d","path":["GCAS_list"]}')})
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'
AND MARD.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"d466cacb","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],        
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
MBEW.STPRS AS [Standard price]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MBEW
ON MBEW.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
AND  MBEW.BWKEY = MARD.WERKS
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"9793a527","path":["GCARS"]}')}')  
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],        
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
MBEW.STPRS AS [Standard price],
MARD.LABST AS [Unrestricted Stock],
MARD.SPEME AS [Blocked Stock],
MARD.INSME AS [Quality Inspect Stock]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MBEW
ON MBEW.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
AND MBEW.BWKEY = MARD.WERKS
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b1cb42d1","path":["GCARS"]}')}')      
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'                                               
AND MARD.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"87541de5","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'                                                
AND MARD.LGORT = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"87541de5","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"6aced24e_c3d9_448f_9f03_06eb2e3db69c"]}')}'

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],        
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
MBEW.STPRS AS [Standard price],
MARD.LABST AS [SAP Inventory],
EKPO.EBELN AS [Purchase Order #],
EKPO.EBELP AS [Purchase Order Item #]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MBEW
ON MBEW.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
AND MBEW.BWKEY = MARD.WERKS
INNER JOIN sap.EKPO
ON MBEW.MATNR = EKPO.MATNR
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"1b23685f","path":["5a902c94_c7b8_4f88_8069_299fbbc62f1b"]}')}')        --[Replace with List of P&G GCAS #]
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'                             --CONSTANT FOR ENGLISH
AND MARD.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"599a58c0","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'                          --[Replace with Plant]
AND MARD.LGORT = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"599a58c0","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"6aced24e_c3d9_448f_9f03_06eb2e3db69c"]}')}'                            --[Replace with Storage Location]
AND EKPO.EBELN = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"1b23685f","path":["a91d4021_ce50_42cc_ac2e_cf28784d60cc"]}')}'                                 --[Scheduling Agreement or Purchase Order #]

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],        
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
MBEW.STPRS AS [Standard price],
MARD.LABST AS [SAP Inventory],
EKPO.EBELN AS [Purchase Order #],
EKPO.EBELP AS [Purchase Order Item #]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MBEW
ON MBEW.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
AND MBEW.BWKEY = MARD.WERKS
INNER JOIN sap.EKPO
ON MBEW.MATNR = EKPO.MATNR
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"2390e16a","path":["8bf11c80_d971_4496_8b43_82773d2b98ab"]}')}')        --[Replace with List of P&G GCAS #]
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'                             --CONSTANT FOR ENGLISH
AND MARD.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"a23d8795","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'                          --[Replace with Plant]
AND MARD.LGORT = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"a23d8795","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"6aced24e_c3d9_448f_9f03_06eb2e3db69c"]}')}'                            --[Replace with Storage Location]
AND EKPO.EBELN = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"2390e16a","path":["8f90e9a8_af70_4e2c_8ddf_3d6146b11c6e"]}')}'                                 --[Scheduling Agreement or Purchase Order #]

input.sql:
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description],
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"35ecdb75","path":["GCARS"]}')}')
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'

input.sql:
--GET Material Description and UoM, Standard price using P&G GCAS #, Plant and Storage Location
SELECT
MAKT.MATNR AS [P&G GCAS #],	
MAKT.MAKTX AS [Material Description], 
MARA.MEINS AS [UoM],
MBEW.STPRS AS [Standard price]
FROM sap.MAKT AS MAKT
INNER JOIN sap.MARA AS MARA
ON MAKT.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MARD
ON MARD.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
INNER JOIN sap.MBEW
ON MBEW.MATNR = MARA.MATNR
AND  MBEW.BWKEY = MARD.WERKS
WHERE RIGHT(MAKT.MATNR,8) IN ('#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"foreach","line":"6027711f","path":["2622e303_5152_4af0_9dc7_9f228aa5d3a4"]}')}')	--Replace with List of P&G GCAS # from Original Brandcode
AND MAKT.SPRAS = 'E'						--CONSTANT FOR ENGLISH
AND MARD.WERKS = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"a40f067a","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"a1a712df_176e_42f9_a45d_6100496ff269"]}')}'						--Replace with Plant
AND MARD.LGORT = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"a40f067a","path":["records",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"6aced24e_c3d9_448f_9f03_06eb2e3db69c"]}')}'						--Replace with Storage Location

extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable This feature requires OPA version 2.7.3 or newer

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
